relevant_findings.general: Young jaundiced gentleman in NAD, pleasant and cooperative, alert awake and oriented x 3
relevant_findings.HEENT: Significant scleral icterus, EOMI, MMM, Op clear, feeding tube in place
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate, normal S1 and S2, no M/R/G
relevant_findings.abdomen: Very mildly distended, no fluid wave appreciated, mild epigastric tenderness to palpation, liver edge palpable 3cm below costal margin, spleen palpable 4-5cm below left costal margin, +BS x 4 quadrants
relevant_findings.extremities: WWP, 1+ pitting edema bilaterally to knees, 2+ pulses, no calf tenderness
relevant_findings.neurological: CN grossly intact, A+Ox3, concentration intact. No asterixis, but does have a mild tremor
